name: Linda COWLEY and Robert Cowley, w/h, Plaintiffs-Respondents, v. VIRTUA HEALTH SYSTEM, Virtua Voorhees Hospital, Robert Gribbon, R.N., and Helene Curran, R.N., Defendants-Petitioners.

court.name: New Jersey Court of Errors and Appeals

parties:
Linda COWLEY and Robert Cowley, w/h, Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
VIRTUA HEALTH SYSTEM, Virtua Voorhees Hospital, Robert Gribbon, R.N., and Helene Curran, R.N., Defendants-Petitioners.

opinions.text: It is ORDERED that the motion of the New Jersey Doctor-Patient Alliance (NJDPA) for leave to appear as amicus curiae is granted, limited to the filing of the brief that accompanied the motion. Movant may request further participation by way of motion.

casebody.head_matter:
Linda COWLEY and Robert Cowley, w/h, Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
VIRTUA HEALTH SYSTEM, Virtua Voorhees Hospital, Robert Gribbon, R.N., and Helene Curran, R.N., Defendants-Petitioners.
M-464 September Term 2018
081891
Supreme Court of New Jersey.
January 18, 2019
ORDER
